value.name: Two Florence police officers return to work following deadly officer-involved shooting
value.description: FLORENCE, S.C. (WMBF) – The Florence Police Department announced on Wednesday that two of the four officers involved in a deadly shooting are back to work. The shooting happened last Wednesday ...

value.description: FLORENCE, S.C. (WMBF) – The Florence Police Department announced on Wednesday that two of the four officers involved in a deadly shooting are back to work. The shooting happened last Wednesday night in the 700 block of Ventura Court. The coroner said ...
